channel.title: Create a website for free
channel.description: So um, I'm pretty sure you all know where I can create a free website. Webs.com sucks, and I can't really find a decent website to make a free website anymore..... Any of you know a good website?

item.title: Create a website for free
item.dc:creator: @Dunder_Mifflin1 Dunder Mifflin
item.description:
@Dunder_Mifflin1 wrote:

[quote=“Classic_, post:15, topic:442592”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=545277.msg3997365#msg3997365 date=1337465329]

Piss off and be nice or don’t post at all, you cunts used to be like him to, new and eager to do something but with no experience.

@OP: If you really want a free website builder/forums/blog. Wordpress is for blogs, SMFnew is for forums, and a regular website? I don’t really know.

  1. No one flamed him in anyway. While java’s comment was unnecessary, mine was in an assisting manner.
  2. We help here, we do not spoonfeed.
  3. Your post stated ‘I don’t really know’ meaning that your post was useless in the manner that you didn’t know what you were talking about.

OP, what type of website do you want?
[/quote]
I liked your comment, it was a neccesary. Dunder Mifflin on the other hand is a total dumbass.

Piss off and be nice or don’t post at all, you cunts used to be like him to, new and eager to do something but with no experience.

@OP: If you really want a free website builder/forums/blog. Wordpress is for blogs, SMFnew is for forums, and a regular website? I don’t really know.

How about you fuck off. I only posted that statment because he said[quote author=xknightpk link=topic=545277.msg3996822#msg3996822 date=1337388461]I need something that requires no work to it. I’m lazy, and rather just do something off a free website.

and that made me go from “wanting to help him” to “ok he clearly doesnt need help”

You rep-- me for saying for “vulgarity” when you posted “retard”, learn to think before you act. I don’t care if he was lazy you don’t need to call him a retard.

sorry mom. I forgot I have to do what people say to me over the internet.

also I said “no need for vulgarity”
and retard isnt vulgar, its legitimate term means “to slow down” . in music ritard means “gradually slow the tempo”. Yeah I used it in a derogitory way, but the word itself is not technically “vuglar” or “profane”. But whatever…
[/quote]
Stop trying to be a smartass, you used it to be rude.[/quote]

I didnt deny i wasnt rude. I said I used it in a “derogitory term”. So whos the dumbass? L2read buddy <3

Read full topic

item.title: Create a website for free
item.dc:creator: @oldschool-scape oldschool-scape
item.description:
@oldschool-scape wrote:

Lol you can download website templates and be a leecher, If ur lazy.

And i ever Heard something about weebly, its something like webs.com but more profesional and more options, anyways never used it.
I create my own websites.

item.title: Create a website for free
item.dc:creator: @classic mopmans little slave
item.description:
@classic wrote:

jmood128:

Ive used x10hosting a few times and they work pretty well. They also include a web site builder, but it’s nothing to advance…

Yes, just use x10 for the hosting and the site, and do whatever you want using HTML, PHP, CSS, etc

Read full topic

item.title: Create a website for free
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

You can try leeching a CSS layout, or you can modify a default three column website template on Dreamweaver. That works too.

I use InMotionHosting as my webhost and I love it.

Read full topic

item.description:

item.title: Create a website for free
item.dc:creator: @Sinned Sinned
item.description:
@Sinned wrote:

I think if you want to have anything half decent, you are going to need to overcome the lazy part. Some people have said that x10 is good, but that’s only what I read.

item.title: Create a website for free
item.dc:creator: @xknightpk xknightpk
item.description:
@xknightpk wrote:

reyx7:

HTML is by far the easiest thing to learn. Why not get some experience yourself?

I learned html, it’s easy by the way! But I need something that requires no work to it. I’m lazy, and rather just do something off a free website.
